content:
I find it very distracting that RA is continually throwing up autosuggestions while I'm typing. The suggestions box is huge, and covers up the code I'm looking at.

Is there any way to turn this off?

I think that would be "editor.quickSuggestions": false in vscode. It is your editor that decides if it requests suggestions or not, so you have to change the config of your editor if you want to disable it.
I think you can also resize the autocompletion box
